attributes.action: Lower the prices for theatre/cinema/ concert tickets, across the board
attributes.additional_details:
I call on the government to force all theatre, cinema & concert venues, to drastically lower their prices for shows, as this is putting people off from visiting these venues in this current economic climate.

I also would like the government to make these venues, allow patrons to sit where they want. Too many companies are not letting this happen and I firmly believe this also putting people off.
